name: resuprompt
description: Full-stack ResuPrompt with AI-powered CV optimization

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:docservice"
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend

author: ResuPrompt Team
